post.description:
Simulate the complete payment flow for testing.
This creates a test payment and automatically processes it.

Simulate a SumUp webhook for testing purposes.
This endpoint allows frontend to trigger webhook events during testing.
Mixin for verifying SumUp webhook requests.

PlanTypeEnum.description:
* `PURE_AFFILIATE` - Pure Affiliate (Commission only)
* `FIXED_PLUS_COMMISSION` - Fixed Payment + Commission
* `TIERED_COMMISSION` - Tiered Commission

PublicAffiliatePlan.description: Public serializer for affiliate plans (visible to non-affiliates).

description.description: Description of what this plan offers

minimum_followers.description: Minimum followers required for this plan

minimum_monthly_conversions.description: Minimum monthly conversions to maintain this plan

QuestionTypeEnum.description:
* `MCQ` - Multiple Choice Question
* `OPEN_ENDED` - Open Ended Question
* `CALCULATION` - Calculation Question

TicketTypeEnum.description:
* `QUESTION` - Question
* `BUG` - Bug
* `FEATURE_REQUEST` - Feature Request
* `BILLING` - Billing
* `OTHER` - Other

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
